line.comment: * SCRIPT NAME: Renegades.Task.Station
* DESCRIPTION: Runs on the single Renegades Station locat ed in the special Renegades Sector.
* This script keeps the station stocked with renegade ships and manages incursions with these ships
* as well as local defense.
* AUTHOR: Mr Mordan
* DATE: 8 April 2024
* Task 202.
* Wait for starting options to be answered.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Replaced difficulty getter with script call.
* Player has turned off renegades, so don't do a thing.
* the 3 hour timer only starts after the renegades is unlocked.
* 10 Minute timer loop
* Maintain appropriate number and type of ships based on difficulty level.
* 3 Hour timer loop
* Every few hours, if our gate has been unlocked, and if we have enough local ships, send some to greet the player with love and friendship
* for debugging.
* Periodically, if the renegade main gate has been uncovered by the player, we will send out half of our local protection force
* to harass random enemy sectors. If the player presence is high enough (about one M7 on high difficulty), we will keep the force in system, but
* if the player backs off or dies then we will send an invasion. Any ships sent will be replaced over time to protect the homeland.
* Get player strength in our system. If it's very high, then don't send out any invasion. An M2 is worth about 500 points. An M6 is worth about 30.
* if local player strength is too high, don't send out an invasion, otherwise do.

line.text: 'Invasion Stalled, Player too strong in renegades system. Playerships = %s'
'Врата открыты. Рой ренегатов отправляется на очистку Вселенной.'

line.comment: * play end-sound effect. laugh or some variant of it.
* TODO: find a better audio?
* send out half our fleet to spread joy and love with player. bwahhahahahah! developers rule.
* this will get picked up in the Renegades.Task.Renegade, forcing the ship to head off towards a random player sector and attack it.

line.text: 'Unable to send invasion, gate is not unlocked'

line.comment: * 10-50 fleet strength (default: 30), determines number of ships we try to maintain at the station.
* Add-Ons 1.3: Insane difficulty increases number of defenders by 33%.
* Build 2 ships every X minutes until we are at, or above strength.
* Spawns an M3 on easy and normal (90%). Spawns an M6 on normal (10%), hard (95%), and insane (90%). Spawns an M7 on hard (5%) and insane (10%).
* Add-Ons 1.2: Pulls from a ship list.

sval.val: An invasion has been forced.
Invasion Stalled, Player too strong in renegades system. Playerships = %s
Врата открыты. Рой ренегатов отправляется на очистку Вселенной.
Sending
ships to attack player
Unable to send invasion, gate is not unlocked
SCRIPT NAME: Renegades.Task.Station
DESCRIPTION: Runs on the single Renegades Station locat ed in the special Renegades Sector.
This script keeps the station stocked with renegade ships and manages incursions with these ships
as well as local defense.
AUTHOR: Mr Mordan
DATE: 8 April 2024
Task 202.
Wait for starting options to be answered.
Add-Ons 1.2: Replaced difficulty getter with script call.
Player has turned off renegades, so don't do a thing.
the 3 hour timer only starts after the renegades is unlocked.
10 Minute timer loop
Maintain appropriate number and type of ships based on difficulty level.
3 Hour timer loop
Every few hours, if our gate has been unlocked, and if we have enough local ships, send some to greet the player with love and friendship
for debugging.
Periodically, if the renegade main gate has been uncovered by the player, we will send out half of our local protection force
to harass random enemy sectors. If the player presence is high enough (about one M7 on high difficulty), we will keep the force in system, but
if the player backs off or dies then we will send an invasion. Any ships sent will be replaced over time to protect the homeland.
Get player strength in our system. If it's very high, then don't send out any invasion. An M2 is worth about 500 points. An M6 is worth about 30.
if local player strength is too high, don't send out an invasion, otherwise do.
play end-sound effect. laugh or some variant of it.
TODO: find a better audio?
send out half our fleet to spread joy and love with player. bwahhahahahah! developers rule.
this will get picked up in the Renegades.Task.Renegade, forcing the ship to head off towards a random player sector and attack it.
10-50 fleet strength (default: 30), determines number of ships we try to maintain at the station.
Add-Ons 1.3: Insane difficulty increases number of defenders by 33%.
Build 2 ships every X minutes until we are at, or above strength.
Spawns an M3 on easy and normal (90%). Spawns an M6 on normal (10%), hard (95%), and insane (90%). Spawns an M7 on hard (5%) and insane (10%).
Add-Ons 1.2: Pulls from a ship list.
